pullrequest.title: Fix duplicate marker services and crash due to unset marker field

content.raw:
The client / server fix works like a charm. I tested it with `examples/standalone/marker` for both server and client.

The scale fix also looks good.

I just have a question about the removal of the `SetVisible` call.
content.html:
The client / server fix works like a charm. I tested it with examples/standalone/marker for both server and client.

The scale fix also looks good.

I just have a question about the removal of the SetVisible call.
